name: Bright Minds Center
longDescription: Bright Minds Center specializes in providing structured literacy programs for children with dyslexia. Our trained specialists use evidence-based approaches.

name: Focus First
shortDescription: Empowering students to manage attention and focus.
longDescription: Focus First offers one-on-one ADHD coaching for school and college students, with a focus on goal setting, time management, and emotional support.

name: Learning Ladder
shortDescription: Individualized learning for children on the autism spectrum.
longDescription: Learning Ladder provides sensory-friendly classrooms, visual learning aids, and behavior therapy sessions to support children with autism.

name: Path to Progress
shortDescription: Customized tutoring for students with diverse learning needs.
longDescription: Path to Progress works with children who face learning delays or academic difficulties, offering tailored programs for math, reading, and writing.

name: Step Ahead Academy
shortDescription: Building communication skills for all learners.
longDescription: Our licensed speech therapists work with children and young adults to develop speech clarity, language comprehension, and social communication.
